trans-unit.source: Defines the modes of security that can be used to configure a service endpoint to receive HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: 定義可用來設定服務端點來接收 HTTP 要求的安全性模式。

trans-unit.source: Use this enumeration to specify whether transport-level security is used by an endpoint configured with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> to receive HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個列舉來指定設定的端點是否使用傳輸層級安全性<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>為接收 HTTP 要求。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: The default value is None, which indicates that no security is used.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 None，表示未使用任何安全性。

trans-unit.source: If the Transport value is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>, then the settings provided by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> property become effective for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的傳輸值<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>，然後將所提供的設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A>屬性成為有效的服務端點。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>

trans-unit.source: The value of WebHttpSecurityMode can only be set in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> constructor that takes it as an explicit parameter and its value cannot be set again after the binding instance is created.
trans-unit.target: WebHttpSecurityMode 值只能在設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>會將它當做明確參數，而且其值無法再次設定之後建立繫結執行個體的建構函式。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: TransportCredentialOnly does not provide message integrity and confidentiality.
trans-unit.target: TransportCredentialOnly 不提供訊息完整性和機密性。

trans-unit.source: It provides HTTP-based client authentication only.
trans-unit.target: 它提供僅限 HTTP 為基礎的用戶端驗證。

trans-unit.source: This mode should be used with caution.
trans-unit.target: 應該謹慎使用這個模式。

trans-unit.source: It should be used in environments, such at IPSec, where the transport security is being provided by other means and only client authentication is provided by the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 它應在環境中使用，例如 IPSec，即要傳輸安全性提供以其他方式只有用戶端驗證係由[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基礎結構。

trans-unit.source: Indicates no security is used with HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: 表示 HTTP 要求與使用任何安全性。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that transport-level security is used with HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: 表示傳輸層級安全性搭配 HTTP 要求。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that only HTTP-based client authentication is provided.
trans-unit.target: 表示只以 HTTP 為基礎的用戶端驗證提供的。
